data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 105,030 believers in the county of Dandong.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dandong, Liaoning, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Dandong, Liaoning, China.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,384,500 souls living in the county of Dandong with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Dandong, Liaoning, China that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Xibe, Western people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, cause the 105,030 believers in Dandong to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 105,030 believers in Dandong that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dandong, Liaoning, China has a population of 1,384,500.

We estimate Dandong has 105,030 people who might know Jesus, 22,366 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,257,104 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,257,104 lost people in  Dandong, Liaoning, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.
